learnerProfile.initialValueHint: The initial value, which is used by the system to calculate the statistic.
learnerProfile.currentValueHint: The current value. Calculated using the initial value and your interactions with artemis.

courseLearnerProfile.title: Course Learner Profile
courseLearnerProfile.description: Here, you are able to view and update your course specific learner profile. These settings are used to calculate your learning progress and to better personalize your learning experience.

aimForGradeOrBonus.label: Aim for grade or additional knowledge
aimForGradeOrBonus.description: Choose the option that best describes your goal for this course.

timeInvestment.label: Time investment
timeInvestment.description: Choose how much time you are willing to invest in this course.

repetitionIntensity.label: Repetition Intensity
repetitionIntensity.description: Choose how much you are willing to repeat the course content.

proficiency.label: Proficiency
proficiency.description: Artemis' estimation of your proficiency in this course.
proficiency.tooltip: The initial value of the calculation is displayed by the grey dot. If you disagree with Artemis' calculation, you can manually set it with the blue button.
